Master Machine Learning Algorithms

Discover How They Work and Implement Them From Scratch i Master Machine Learning Algorithms is a book by Jason Brownlee that covers machine learning algorithms from scratch. The book provides an introduction to the field of machine learning, including data types, statistical learning perspective, computer science perspective, models, and algorithms. It also discusses how to implement these algorithms using Python.

Key Concepts:

  • Master Machine Learning Algorithms
  • Discover How They Work and Implement Them From Scratch
  • Machine Learning Mastery
  • Simple Linear Regression
  • Stochastic Gradient Descent
  • Machine Learning
  • Supervised Learning
  • Probability Density Function
  • AdaBoost Ensemble
  • Making Predictions with AdaBoost
